sentences.en: A fire on the city gate brings disaster to the fish in the moat.
Boys in the boat bought buoys in the moat.
sentences.cn: 船里的男孩买了护城河里的浮筒.

sentences.en: Certainly no one in the media would deny the attraction of living behind a deep moat, even if it is filled with sharks.
sentences.cn: 当然，在媒体业，没有人会否认围在深深的护城河里面过日子的吸引力，即使那河里满是鲨鱼在游来游去。

sentences.en: Energetic, young and heart have been unruly, natural moat change thoroughfare!
sentences.cn: 血气方刚, 风华正茂,心已不羁, 天堑变通途!

sentences.en: First, Mr Slim benefits from what Buffett calls a wide moat.
sentences.cn: 首先, 斯利姆得益于巴菲特口中的“宽阔护城河”.

sentences.en: For local boys the moat at Angkor Wat is a swimming hole.
sentences.cn: 在当地男孩们的眼里,吴哥窟的护城河不过是个游泳池.

sentences.en: I thought it less a lake and more a moat.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这海洋不象湖泊,却更象困住我们的围城河.

sentences.en: I thought it less like a lake more like a moat.
sentences.cn: 我觉得它不象湖泊,更象深渊.

sentences.en: It's a shame our particular moat, the ashram of Pray, is so exhausting, because in the Love section Bardem proves himself a worthy castle.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我们急缺实际的护城河，祈祷的场所，因为在爱这部分里，巴登证明了自己就是一座有价值的城堡。

sentences.en: Moat The moat around our city has been seriously polluted recently.
sentences.cn: 我们城市周围的护城河最近被严重污染了.

sentences.en: Outside the old city moat, Yi Zhang deep water.
sentences.cn: 城门外原有护城河, 蓄水一丈多深.

sentences.en: Several dark mat boats were scattered on the moat.
sentences.cn: 环城河里稀稀落落地停着几只乌篷船.

sentences.en: Shaoxing Plaza, along the moat to go north, not how far the streets there.
sentences.cn: 沿着绍兴广场的护城河北走，没有多远，老街就出现了。

sentences.en: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.cn: 这座桥就像是坐落在护城河中的一条沟渠，这种造型是为了使它与周围的风景融合在一起。

sentences.en: The castle had a deep moat which emptied into the lake.
sentences.cn: 城堡有一条很深的流入湖里的护城河.

sentences.en: The city moat of Xiang Yang is the widest one in China.
sentences.cn: 襄阳护城河是全国最宽的护城河.

sentences.en: The medieval town a high wall and a deep moat.
sentences.cn: 这座中世纪的城市周围建有城墙和护城河.

sentences.en: The medieval town was fortified with a high wall and a deep moat.
sentences.cn: 这座中世纪的城市用高墙深沟来加强防御.

sentences.en: When the moat is deep a ladder can be used.
sentences.cn: 城壕深了架梯子;问题总有解决的办法.

trans.tran_en: a deep wide hole, usually filled with water, dug around a castle as a defence
